title: Ranked Game (Promos) That I Actually Couldn't Play
body:
I was loading into game for my **promos**, getting the "League Of Legends" banner on the screen as usual. Then windows comes up saying that "PvP.net Patcher Kernel is not responding"  So I decide to open task manager and close it so I can get back into game without having to reload the launcher. Then nothing comes up, I don't even get the option to reconnect to my game.
 (https://i.imgur.com/ktqjLrC.png) 
I couldn't get the windows trying to close the patcher to stop so eventually I had to restart my computer because it wouldn't go away. 
(https://i.imgur.com/uTRgH5n.png)
 They ended up remaking and I lost my second game in my promos. Is there anyway I can get this revoked or do I just have to deal with it?

replies.body:
We are unable to modify game results after they're recorded by the servers, unfortunately. It appears your issues may be caused by Leauge not operating with the right privileges, so I recommend [**configuring your system permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions#wq3) to prevent this from happening again.

Let me know if you encounter further issues with this issue.
